1.0.1.en: Added support for ZigBee and Z-Wave devices, and improved the remote control triggers.

2.0.0.en: 1) Support Homey V5.0.0. 2) Support all namron devices. 3) Optimized the support for Flow, especially Remote. 4) If the previous devices are not working properly, please add them again.

2.1.0.en: Added state report for ZigBee Light, added alarm_contact for Door Sensor, added meter_power and measure_power for 4512724, made some performance improvements.

2.1.1.en: Fixed the problem of 4512715 not working.

2.1.4.en: Fix the issue that doesn't work with older devices.

2.1.10.en: Fixes an issue that some devices do not recognize.

2.1.13.en: Add support for the latest remote firmware.

2.1.15.en: Add the support for the thermostat mode to 4512725.

2.1.16.en: Add the support for the thermostat mode to 4512725.

2.2.1.en: Make the flow clear and concise, change the Zwave device to unsecure.

2.2.2.en: Add support for 4512744, 4512745, 4512746; Bug fixes and improvements.

2.2.3.en: Fixes an issue that some Z-Wave devices pairing failed.

2.2.11.en: Add support for the ZigBee thermostat, bug fixes.

2.2.13.en: Add support for the Homey Cloud.

2.2.25.en: Added support for 4512739 CCT Light Controller.

2.2.27.en: Fixed an issue that caused the level not to update.
